attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is high time that the Minister for Defense, Des Browne was replaced with a more effective and dynamic person, preferably a highly experienced high ranking officer who knows what he is about. Des Browne has no charisma and is obviously unsuited for the job which he finds himself in, thanks to Tony Blair.
As an ex-serviceman myself I say that it is essential that something is done quickly before our Armed Forces disintegrate. Browne out as soon as possible

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
